summary: This bill, the Project Safe Neighborhoods Reauthorization Act of 2025, reauthorizes and amends the Project Safe Neighborhoods Grant Program, a nationwide initiative aimed at reducing violent crime. It expands the definition of eligible program activities to include hiring crime analysts, covering overtime for law enforcement and assistants, and utilizing new technology. The bill also mandates annual reports to Congress on fund usage, community outreach, and violent crime statistics. Additionally, it dedicates funds to support multi-jurisdictional task forces and is titled in part the Officer Ella Grace French and Sergeant Jim Smith Task Force Support Act of 2025.
